process.name: Blueprism - Azure Queues REST API
process.narrative: This VBO provides a mechanism for interacting with Azure Queues via their exposed REST API. It includes actions for adding, peeking, retrieving, updating, and deleting messages.

stage.name: Stage1
Add Message
stage.narrative: Adds a message to the queue.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
Clean Up Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some finalisation (or "cleanup") tasks as your business object is closed down.
The cleanup action will be called automatically immediately after closing your business object at the end of a business process.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than before the disposal of the business object.

stage.name: Note2
stage.narrative:
Initialise Page
This is an optional page where you might choose to perform some initialisation tasks after your business object is loaded.
The initialise action will be called automatically immediately after loading your business object.
You will not be able to call this action from a business process, nor will it be called at any other time than after the creation of the object.

stage.name: Retrieve Next Message
stage.narrative: Retrieves the next available message from the queue and makes it invisible to other consumers for the specified number of seconds.

stage.name: Retrieve Messages
stage.narrative: Retrieves the specified number of messages from the queue and makes them invisible to other consumers for the specified number of seconds.

input.name: Visibility Timeout Seconds
input.narrative: Total number of seconds to keep the queue messages retieved invisible to prevent them being processed by another worker. Default is 30.

input.name: Number to Retrieve
input.narrative: The number of messages to retrieve. Can be a number between 1 and 32. Default is 32.

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the Azure Queue

input.name: Acces Key
input.narrative: The access key for the Azure storage account that the Azure Queue belongs to

input.name: Storage Account Name
input.narrative: The name of the Azure storage account that the Azure Queue belongs to

output.name: Success
output.narrative: Flag to indicate success of this action

output.name: Result
output.narrative: If an error occrus, this output will contain text describing result of this action

output.name: Messages
output.narrative: Messages retrieved from the queue

output.name: HTTP Status Code
output.narrative: HTTP status code of the request made to the REST API endpoint

output.name: Response Headers
output.narrative: Collection of the response headers from the request made to the REST API endpoint

output.name: Response Content
output.narrative: The raw response from the request made to the REST API endpoint

stage.name: Retrieve Messages
Number to Retrieve
stage.narrative: The number of messages to retrieve. Can be a number between 1 and 32. Default is 32.

stage.name: Delete Message
stage.narrative: Deletes a message from the queue.

stage.name: Visibility Timeout Seconds
stage.narrative: Total number of seconds to keep the queue messages retieved invisible to prevent them being processed by another worker. Default is 30.

input.narrative: Total number of seconds to keep the queue messages retieved invisible to prevent them being processed by another worker. Default is 30.

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the Azure Queue

input.name: Acces Key
input.narrative: The access key for the Azure storage account that the Azure Queue belongs to

input.name: Storage Account Name
input.narrative: The name of the Azure storage account that the Azure Queue belongs to

output.narrative: Flag to indicate success of this action

output.name: Result
output.narrative: If an error occrus, this output will contain text describing result of this action

input.narrative: The name of the Azure Queue

input.name: Storage Account Name
input.narrative: The name of the Azure storage account that the Azure Queue belongs to

input.name: Message Id
input.narrative: Required. The message ID, a GUID that identifies the message in the queue.

input.name: Message Pop Receipt
input.narrative: Required. Specifies the valid pop receipt value returned from an earlier call to the Get Messages or Update Message operation.

stage.name: Add Message
Peek Messages
stage.narrative: Retrieves the specified number of messages from the queue but does not alter their visibility so they remain available for other consumers to work.

input.name: Number to Retrieve
input.narrative: The number of messages to retrieve. Can be a number between 1 and 32. Default is 32.

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the Azure Queue

input.name: Acces Key
input.narrative: The access key for the Azure storage account that the Azure Queue belongs to

input.name: Storage Account Name
input.narrative: The name of the Azure storage account that the Azure Queue belongs to

output.name: Success
output.narrative: Flag to indicate success of this action

output.name: Result
output.narrative: If an error occrus, this output will contain text describing result of this action

output.name: Messages
output.narrative: Messages retrieved from the queue

output.name: HTTP Status Code
output.narrative: HTTP status code of the request made to the REST API endpoint

output.name: Response Headers
output.narrative: Collection of the response headers from the request made to the REST API endpoint

output.name: Response Content
output.narrative: The raw response from the request made to the REST API endpoint

stage.name: Peek Messages
Number to Retrieve
stage.narrative: The number of messages to retrieve. Can be a number between 1 and 32. Default is 32.

stage.name: Peek Next Message
stage.narrative: Retrieves the next available message from the queue but does not alter its visibility so it remains available for other consumers to work.

input.narrative: The name of the Azure Queue

input.name: Acces Key
input.narrative: The access key for the Azure storage account that the Azure Queue belongs to

input.name: Storage Account Name
input.narrative: The name of the Azure storage account that the Azure Queue belongs to

output.narrative: Flag to indicate success of this action

output.narrative: If an error occrus, this output will contain text describing result of this action

stage.name: Delete All Messages
stage.narrative: Deletes all messages from the queue.

input.narrative: The name of the Azure Queue

input.name: Acces Key
input.narrative: The access key for the Azure storage account that the Azure Queue belongs to

stage.name: Update Message
stage.narrative: Updates a message in the queue.

input.name: Visibility Timeout Seconds
input.narrative: Total number of seconds to keep the queue messages retieved invisible to prevent them being processed by another worker. Default is 30.

input.name: Message Pop Receipt
input.narrative: Required. Specifies the valid pop receipt value returned from an earlier call to the Get Messages or Update Message operation.

input.name: Message Content
input.narrative: Required. The content of the message

input.name: Queue Name
input.narrative: The name of the Azure Queue

input.name: Acces Key
input.narrative: The access key for the Azure storage account that the Azure Queue belongs to

input.name: Storage Account Name
input.narrative: The name of the Azure storage account that the Azure Queue belongs to

output.name: Success
output.narrative: Flag to indicate success of this action

output.name: Result
output.narrative: If an error occrus, this output will contain text describing result of this action

output.name: Messages
output.narrative: Messages retrieved from the queue

output.name: HTTP Status Code
output.narrative: HTTP status code of the request made to the REST API endpoint

output.name: Response Headers
output.narrative: Collection of the response headers from the request made to the REST API endpoint

output.name: Response Content
